GK16visvsdpu:4: śarad-indu-sundara-ruciś cetasi sā me girāṃ devī /
GK16visvsdpu:5: apahṛtya tamaḥ santatam arthān akhilān prakāśayatu // VisSd_1.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:7: kāvyād eva yatas tena tat-svarūpaṃ nirūpyate // VisSd_1.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:10: iti sāhitya-darpaṇe kāvya-svarūpa-nirūpaṇo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visvsdpu:11: dvitīyaḥ prakāśaḥ vākyaṃ syād yogyatākāṅkṣā-satti-yuktaḥ padoccayaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:12: vākyoccayo mahā-vākyam itthaṃ vākyaṃ dvidhā matam // VisSd_2.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:14: artho vācyaś ca lakṣyaś ca vyaṅgaś ceti tridhā matā // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:16: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syus tisraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:18: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇa-dravya-kriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:20: rūḍheḥ prayojanād vāpi lakṣaṇā śaktir arpitā // VisSd_2.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:28: sādṛśyetara-saṃbandhāḥ śuddhās tāḥ sakalā api // VisSd_2.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:29: sādṛśyāt tu matā gauṇyas tena ṣoḍaśa-bhedikā /
GK16visvsdpu:30: vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvād dvidhā syuḥ phala-lakṣaṇā // VisSd_2.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:32: tad evaṃ lakṣaṇābhedāś catvāriṃśan matā budhaiḥ // VisSd_2.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:35: sā vṛttir vyañjanā nāma śabdasyārthādikasya ca /
GK16visvsdpu:39: lakṣaṇopāsyate yasya kṛte tat tu prayojanam /
GK16visvsdpu:40: yayā pratyākhyāyate sā syād vyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:43: vaiśiṣṭyād anyam arthaṃ yā bodhayet sārtha-saṃbhavā /
GK16visvsdpu:44: traividhyād iyam arthānāṃ pratyekaṃ trividhā matā // VisSd_2.17 //
GK16visvsdpu:46: ekasya vyañjakatve tad anyasya sahakāritā // VisSd_2.18 //
GK16visvsdpu:48: śabdo 'pi vācakas tadval lakṣako vyañjakas tathā // VisSd_2.19 //
GK16visvsdpu:50: tātparyārthaṃ tad-arthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tad-bodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visvsdpu:51: iti sāhitya-darpaṇe vākya-svarūpa-nirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visvsdpu:52: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ vibhāvenānubhāvena vyaktaḥ saṃcāriṇā tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:53: rasatām eti ratyādiḥ sthāyī bhāvaḥ sa-cetasām // VisSd_3.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:58: karuṇādāv api rase jāyate yatparaṃ sukham /
GK16visvsdpu:59: sacetasām anubhavaḥ pramāṇaṃ tatra kevalam // VisSd_3.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:60: kiṃ ca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāt tad-unmukhaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:63: śoka-harṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:65: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visvsdpu:67: na jāyate tad-āsvādo vinā raty-ādi-vāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visvsdpu:73: sādhāraṇyena raty-ādir api tadvat pratīyate // VisSd_3.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:74: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visvsdpu:75: tad-āsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visvsdpu:77: alaukikatvam eteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visvsdpu:79: rasodbodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇāny eva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visvsdpu:81: tataḥ saṃvalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sa-cetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:83: sad-bhāvaś ced vibhāvāder dvayor ekasya vā bhavet // VisSd_3.16 //
GK16visvsdpu:84: jhaṭity anyasam ākṣepe tadā doṣo na vidyate /
GK16visvsdpu:86: anukāryasya ratyāder udbodho na raso bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:92: tasmān na kāryaḥ no nityaḥ pūrva-saṃvedanojjhitaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:93: asaṃvedana-kāle hi na bhāvo 'py asya vidyate // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visvsdpu:98: na nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tasya grāhakam iṣyate /
GK16visvsdpu:102: tasmād alaukikaḥ satyaṃ vedyaḥ sahṛdayair ayam /
GK16visvsdpu:103: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visvsdpu:107: ato 'sya sva-prakāśatvam akhaṇḍatvaṃ ca sidhyati // VisSd_3.28 //
GK16visvsdpu:110: ālambanaṃ nāyakādis tam ālambya rasodgamāt // VisSd_3.29 //
GK16visvsdpu:114: dhīra-praśānta ity ayam uktaḥ prathamaś caturbhedaḥ // VisSd_3.31 //
GK16visvsdpu:116: stheyān nigūḍhamāno dhīrodātto dṛḍha-vrataḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.32 //
GK16visvsdpu:119: niścinto mṛdur aniśaṃ kalā-paro dhīra-lalitaḥ syāt /
GK16visvsdpu:120: sāmānya-guṇair bhūyān divjādiko dhīra-praśāntaḥ syāt // VisSd_3.34 //
GK16visvsdpu:122: eṣu tv aneka-mahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visvsdpu:123: kṛtāgā api niḥśaṅkas tarjito 'pi na lajjitaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:125: anukūla eka-nirataḥ śaṭho 'yam ekatra baddha-bhāvo yaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:126: darśita-bahir-anurāgo vipriyam anyatra gūḍham ācarati // VisSd_3.37 //
GK16visvsdpu:128: uktā nāyaka-bhedāś catvāriṃśat tathāṣṭau ca // VisSd_3.38 //
GK16visvsdpu:130: kiñcit tad-guṇa-hīnaḥ sahāya evāsya pīṭha-mardākhyaḥ // VisSd_3.39 //
GK16visvsdpu:132: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupita-vadhū-māna-bhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40
GK16visvsdpu:134: veśopacāra-kuśalo vāgmī madhuro 'tha bahu-mato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visvsdpu:136: hāsya-karaḥ kalaha-ratir vidūṣakaḥ syāt sva-karma-jñaḥ // VisSd_3.42 //
GK16visvsdpu:137: mantrī syād arthānāṃ cintāyāṃ tadvad avarodhe /
GK16visvsdpu:140: so 'yam anūḍha-bhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ity uktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visvsdpu:142: ṛtvik-purodhasaḥ syur brahma-vidas tāpasās tathā dharme // VisSd_3.45 //
GK16visvsdpu:146: kārya-preṣyas tridhā dūto dūtyaś cāpi tathāvidhāḥ // VisSd_3.47 //
GK16visvsdpu:147: ubhayor bhāvam unnīya svayaṃ vadati cottaram /
GK16visvsdpu:148: suśliṣṭaṃ kurute kāryaṃ nisṛṣṭārthas tu sa smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.48 //
GK16visvsdpu:152: lalitaudāryam ity aṣṭau sattvajāḥ pauruṣā guṇāḥ // VisSd_3.50 //
GK16visvsdpu:154: nīce ghūṇādhike spardhā yataḥ śobheti tāṃ viduḥ // VisSd_3.51 //
GK16visvsdpu:155: dhīrā dṛṣṭir gatiś citrā vilāse sasmitaṃ vacaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:156: sāṅkṣobheṣv apy anudvego mādhuryaṃ parikīrtitam // VisSd_3.52 //
GK16visvsdpu:158: vyavasāyād acalanaṃ dhairyaṃ vighne mahaty api // VisSd_3.53 //
GK16visvsdpu:162: dānaṃ sa-priya-bhāṣaṇam audāryaṃ śatru-mitrayoḥ samatā // VisSd_3.55 //
GK16visvsdpu:163: atha nāyikā tri-bhedā svānyā sādhāraṇā strīti /
GK16visvsdpu:166: sāpi kathitā tribhedā mugdhā madhyā pragalbheti // VisSd_3.57 //
GK16visvsdpu:168: kathitā mṛduś ca māne samadhika-lajjāvatī mugdhā // VisSd_3.58 //
GK16visvsdpu:173: te dhīrā cāpy adhīrā ca dhīrādhīreti ṣaḍ-vidhe /
GK16visvsdpu:174: priyaṃ sotprāsa-vakroktyā madhyā dhīrā dahed ruṣā // VisSd_3.61 //
GK16visvsdpu:176: pragalbhā yadi dhīrā syāc channa-kopākṛtis tadā // VisSd_3.62 //
GK16visvsdpu:177: udāste surate tatra darśayanty ādarān bahiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:178: dhīrādhīrā tu solluṇṭha-bhāṣitaiḥ khedayaty amum // VisSd_3.63 //
GK16visvsdpu:179: tarjayet tāḍayed anyā pratyekaṃ tā api dvidhā /
GK16visvsdpu:182: mugdhā tv ekaiva tena syuḥ svīyābhedās trayodaśā // VisSd_3.65 //
GK16visvsdpu:183: parakīyā dvidhā proktā paroḍhā kanyakā tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:187: nirguṇān api na dveṣṭi na rajyati guṇiṣv api /
GK16visvsdpu:188: vitta-mātraṃ samālokya sā rāgaṃ darśayed bahiḥ // VisSd_3.68 //
GK16visvsdpu:192: liṅginaś channa-kāmādyā asyāḥ prāyeṇa vallabhāḥ // VisSd_3.70 //
GK16visvsdpu:194: raktāyāṃ vā viraktāyāṃ ratam asyāṃ satyānurāgiṇī // VisSd_3.71 //
GK16visvsdpu:198: anyā vāsaka-sajjā syād virahotkaṇṭhitā tathā // VisSd_3.73 //
GK16visvsdpu:202: sā khaṇḍiteti kathitā dhīrair īrṣyā-kaṣāyitā // VisSd_3.75 //
GK16visvsdpu:204: svayaṃ vābhisaraty eṣā dhīrair uktābhisārikā // VisSd_3.76 //
GK16visvsdpu:212: mālā-pañcaḥ śmaśānaṃ ca nadyādīnāṃ taṭī tathā // VisSd_3.80 //
GK16visvsdpu:214: sthānāny aṣṭau tathā dhvānta-cchanne kutracid āśraye // VisSd_3.81 //
GK16visvsdpu:215: cāṭukāram api prāṇa-nāthaṃ roṣād apāsya yā /
GK16visvsdpu:216: paścāt tāpam avāpnoti kalahāntaritā tu sā // VisSd_3.82 //
GK16visvsdpu:217: priyaḥ kṛtvāpi saṅketaṃ yasyā nāyāti saṃnidhim /
GK16visvsdpu:218: vipralabdhā tu sā jñeyā nitāntam avamānitā // VisSd_3.83 //
GK16visvsdpu:222: sā tu vāsaka-sajjā syād vidita-priya-saṅgamā // VisSd_3.85 //
GK16visvsdpu:223: āgantuṃ kṛta-citto 'pi daivān nāyāti yat priyaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:228: itarā apy asaṅkhyās tā noktā vistara-śaṅkayā // VisSd_3.88 //
GK16visvsdpu:231: śobhā kāntiś ca dīptiś ca m ādhuryaṃ ca pragalbhatā /
GK16visvsdpu:232: audāryaṃ dhairyam ity ete saptaiva syur ayatnajāḥ // VisSd_3.90 //
GK16visvsdpu:234: moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vibhramo lalitaṃ madaḥ // VisSd_3.91 //
GK16visvsdpu:235: vihṛtaṃ tapanaṃ maugdhyaṃ vikṣepaś ca kutūhalam /
GK16visvsdpu:236: hasitaṃ cakitaṃ kelir ity aṣṭādaśa-saṅkhyakāḥ // VisSd_3.92 //
GK16visvsdpu:237: svabhāvājāś ca bhāvādyā daśa puṃsāṃ bhavanty api /
GK16visvsdpu:244: kāntir evātivistīrṇā dīptir ity abhidhīyate // VisSd_3.96 //
GK16visvsdpu:246: niḥsādhvasatvaṃ prāgalbhyam audāryaṃ vinayaḥ sadā // VisSd_3.97 //
GK16visvsdpu:248: aṅgair veṣair alaṅkāraiḥ premibhir vacanair api // VisSd_3.98 //
GK16visvsdpu:260: asthāne vibhramādīnāṃ vinyāso vibhramo mataḥ // VisSd_3.104 //
GK16visvsdpu:265: ajñānād iva yā pṛcchā pratītasyāpi vastunaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:266: vallabhasya puraḥ proktaṃ maugdhyaṃ tat-tattva-vedibhiḥ // VisSd_3.107 //
GK16visvsdpu:268: rahasyākhyānam īṣāc ca vikṣepo dayitāntike // VisSd_3.108 //
GK16visvsdpu:272: vihāre saha kāntena krīḍitaṃ kelir ucyate // VisSd_3.110 //
GK16visvsdpu:273: dṛṣṭvā darśayati vrīḍāṃ saṃmukhaṃ naiva paśyati /
GK16visvsdpu:274: pracchannaṃ vā bhramantaṃ vā-(a)tikrāntaṃ paśyati priyam // VisSd_3.111 //
GK16visvsdpu:276: sagadgada-svaraṃ kiñcit priyaṃ prāyeṇa bhāṣate // VisSd_3.112 //
GK16visvsdpu:277: anyaiḥ pravartitāṃ śaśvat sāvadhānā ca tat-kathām /
GK16visvsdpu:278: śṛṇoty anyatra dattākṣī priye bālānurāgiṇī // VisSd_3.113 //
GK16visvsdpu:279: cirāya savidhe sthānaṃ priyasya bahu manyate /
GK16visvsdpu:280: vilocana-pathaṃ cāsya na gacchaty analaṅkṛtā // VisSd_3.114 //
GK16visvsdpu:282: bāhu-mūlaṃ stanau nābhi-paṅkajaṃ darśayet sphuṭam // VisSd_3.115 //
GK16visvsdpu:284: viśvasity asya mitreṣu bahu-mānaṃ karoti ca // VisSd_3.116 //
GK16visvsdpu:285: sakhī-madhye guṇān brūte sva-dhanaṃ pradadāti ca /
GK16visvsdpu:286: supte svapiti duḥkhe 'sya duḥkhaṃ dhatte sukhe sukham // VisSd_3.117 //
GK16visvsdpu:289: yat kiñcid api saṃvīkṣya kurute hasitaṃ mudhā /
GK16visvsdpu:291: jṛmbhate sphoṭayaty aṅgaṃ bālam āśliṣya cumbati /
GK16visvsdpu:292: bhāle tathā vayasyāyā racayet tilaka-kriyām // VisSd_3.120 //
GK16visvsdpu:294: daśati svādharaṃ cāpi brūte priyam adhomukhī // VisSd_3.121 //
GK16visvsdpu:295: na muñcati ca taṃ deśaṃ nāyako yatra dṛśyate /
GK16visvsdpu:296: āgacchati gṛhaṃ tasya kārya-vyājena kenacit // VisSd_3.122 //
GK16visvsdpu:297: dattaṃ kim api kāntena dhṛtvāṅge muhur īkṣate /
GK16visvsdpu:298: nityaṃ hṛṣyati tad-yoge viyoge malinā kṛśā // VisSd_3.123 //
GK16visvsdpu:299: manyate bahu tac-chīlaṃ tat-priyaṃ manyate priyam /
GK16visvsdpu:300: prārthayaty alpa-mūlyāni suptā na parivartate // VisSd_3.124 //
GK16visvsdpu:302: bhāṣate sūnṛtaṃ snigdhām anuraktā nitambinī // VisSd_3.125 //
GK16visvsdpu:308: dūtyaḥ sakhī naṭī dāsī dhātreyī prativeśinī // VisSd_3.128 //
GK16visvsdpu:309: bālā pravrajitā kārūḥ śilpinyādyāḥ svayaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:310: kalā-kauśalam utsāho bhaktiś cittajñatā smṛtiḥ // VisSd_3.129 //
GK16visvsdpu:314: uddīpana-vibhāvās te rasam uddīpayanti ye // VisSd_3.131 //
GK16visvsdpu:316: udbuddhaṃ kāraṇaiḥ svaiḥ svari bahir bhāvaṃ prakāśayan // VisSd_3.132 //
GK16visvsdpu:318: uktāḥ strīṇām alaṅkārā aṅgajāś ca svabhāvajāḥ // VisSd_3.133 //
GK16visvsdpu:319: tad-rūpāḥ sāttvikā bhāvās tathā ceṣṭāḥ parā api /
GK16visvsdpu:322: stambhaḥ svedo 'tha romāñcaḥ svara-bhaṅgo 'tha vepathuḥ // VisSd_3.135 //
GK16visvsdpu:323: vaivarṇyam aśru-pralaya ity aṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:333: sthāyiny unmagna-nirmagnās trayastriṃśac ca tad-bhidāḥ // VisSd_3.140 //
GK16visvsdpu:344: iṣṭād dharṣāḥ śuco 'niṣṭāj jñeyāś cānye yathāyatham /
GK16visvsdpu:348: amunā cottamaḥ śete madhyo hasati gāyati /
GK16visvsdpu:349: adhama-prakṛtiś cāpi paruṣaṃ vakti roditi // VisSd_3.147 //
GK16visvsdpu:358: svapno nidrām upetasya viṣayānubhavas tu yaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:381: smeratā dhṛti-satoṣau bahu-mānaś ca tad-bhavāḥ // VisSd_3.163 //
GK16visvsdpu:399: śṛṅgāra-vīrayor hāso vīre krodhas tathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.172 //
GK16visvsdpu:401: ity ādy-anyat samunnateyaṃ tathā bhāvita-buddhibhiḥ // VisSd_3.173 //
GK16visvsdpu:402: aviruddhā viruddhā vā yaṃ tirodhātum akṣamāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:404: ratir hāsaś ca śokaś ca krodhotsāhau bhayaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:405: jugupsā vismayaś cettham aṣṭau proktāḥ śamo 'pi ca // VisSd_3.175 //
GK16visvsdpu:411: raudra-śaktyā tu janitaṃ citta-vaiklavyaṃ bhayam // VisSd_3.178 //
GK16visvsdpu:414: visphāraś cetaso yas tu sa vismaya udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:417: tasmād bhāvā amī proktāḥ sthāyi-sañcāri-sāttvikāḥ // VisSd_3.181 //
GK16visvsdpu:419: bībhatso 'dbhuta ity aṣṭau rasāḥ śāntas tathā mataḥ // VisSd_3.182 //
GK16visvsdpu:423: ālambanaṃ nāyikāḥ syur dakṣiṇādyāś ca nāyakam // VisSd_3.184 //
GK16visvsdpu:428: vipralambho 'tha saṃbhoga ity eṣa dvividho mataḥ // VisSd_3.186 //
GK16visvsdpu:429: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭam upaitai vipralambho 'sau /
GK16visvsdpu:430: sa ca pūrva-rāga-māna-pravāsa-karuṇātmakaś caturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.187 //
GK16visvsdpu:432: daśā-viśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visvsdpu:434: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣāt svapne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visvsdpu:436: unmādo 'tha vyādhir jaḍatā mṛtir iti daśātra kāma-daśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visvsdpu:443: jāta-prāyaṃ tu tad vācyaṃ cetasākāṅkṣitaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:444: varṇyate 'pi yadi pratyuj-jīvanaṃ syād adūrataḥ // VisSd_3.194 //
GK16visvsdpu:445: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāt tad-iṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:446: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visvsdpu:447: na cātiśobhate yan nāpaiti prema manogatam /
GK16visvsdpu:448: tan nīlī-rāgam ākhyātaṃ yathā śrī-rāma-sītayoḥ // VisSd_3.196 //
GK16visvsdpu:449: kusumbha-rāgaṃ tat prāhur yad apaiti ca śobhate /
GK16visvsdpu:450: mañjiṣṭhā-rāgam āhus tad yan nāpaity atiśobhate // VisSd_3.197 //
GK16visvsdpu:451: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyā-samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:452: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahaty api // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visvsdpu:453: premṇaḥ kuṭila-gāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visvsdpu:455: īrṣyāmāno bhavet strīṇāṃ tatratv anumitis tridhā /
GK16visvsdpu:457: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca naty-upekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visvsdpu:458: tad-bhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍ-upāyān iti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visvsdpu:460: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visvsdpu:463: pravāso bhinna-deśitvaṃ kāryāc chāpāc ca saṃbhramāt /
GK16visvsdpu:466: aṅgeṣv asauṣṭhavaṃ tāpaḥ pāṇḍutā kṛśatāruciḥ // VisSd_3.205 //
GK16visvsdpu:468: mṛtiś ceti kramāj jñeyā daśa smara-daśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visvsdpu:473: bhāvī bhavan bhūta iti tridhā syāt tatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visvsdpu:474: yūnor ekatarasmin gatavati lokāntaraṃ punar alabhye /
GK16visvsdpu:475: vimanāyate yadaikas tato bhavet karuṇa-vipralambhākhyaḥ // VisSd_3.209 //
GK16visvsdpu:479: ayam eka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhoga-śṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visvsdpu:482: anulepana-bhūṣāḍyā vācyaṃ śuci medhyam anyac ca /
GK16visvsdpu:483: kathitaś caturvidho 'sāv ānantaryāt tu pūrva-rāgādeḥ // VisSd_3.213 //
GK16visvsdpu:487: tam atrālambanaṃ prāhus tac-ceṣṭoddīpanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.215 //
GK16visvsdpu:491: nīcānām apahasitaṃ tathātihasitaṃ tad eṣa ṣaḍ-bhedaḥ // VisSd_3.217 //
GK16visvsdpu:493: kiñcil lakṣa-dvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visvsdpu:495: apahasitaṃ sāsrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavaty atihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visvsdpu:496: yasya hāsaḥ sa cet kvāpi sākṣān naiva nibadhyate /
GK16visvsdpu:502: śoko 'tra sthāyi-bhāvaḥ syāc chocyam ālambanaṃ matam /
GK16visvsdpu:503: tasya dāhādikāvasthā bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.223 //
GK16visvsdpu:511: ālambanam aris tasya tac ceṣṭoddīpanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.227 //
GK16visvsdpu:524: anubhāvās tu tatra syuḥ sahāyānveṣaṇādayaḥ // VisSd_3.233 //
GK16visvsdpu:526: sa ca dāna-dharma-yuddhair dayayā ca samanvitaś caturdhā syāt //
GK16visvsdpu:529: yasmād utpadyate bhītis tad atrālambanaṃ matam /
GK16visvsdpu:530: ceṣṭā ghoratarās tasya bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.236 //
GK16visvsdpu:540: anubhāvās tatra matās tathā syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // VisSd_3.241 //
GK16visvsdpu:544: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaved uddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visvsdpu:554: romāñcādyāś cānubhāvās tathā syur vyabhicāriṇaḥ // VisSd_3.248 //
GK16visvsdpu:557: yukta-viyukta-daśāyām avasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:558: rasatām eti tad asmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiś ca na viśuddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visvsdpu:559: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:560: sthāyī vatsalatā snehaḥ putrādy-ālambanaṃ matam // VisSd_3.251 //
GK16visvsdpu:570: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīra-rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visvsdpu:573: śṛṅgāreṇa tu bībhatsa ity ākhyātā virodhitā /
GK16visvsdpu:574: kuto 'pi kāraṇāt kvāpi sthiratām upayann api // VisSd_3.258 //
GK16visvsdpu:575: unmādādir na tu sthāyī na pātre sthairyam eti yat /
GK16visvsdpu:577: sandhiḥ śabalatā ceti sarve 'pi rasanād rasāḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:579: udbuddha-mātraḥ sthāyī ca bhāva ity abhidhīyate /
GK16visvsdpu:581: udrekaḥ kasyacit kvāpi tathā sañcāriṇo rase /
GK16visvsdpu:587: śānte ca hīna-niṣṭhe gurv-ādy ālambane hāsye /
GK16visvsdpu:590: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādi-viṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visvsdpu:592: bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visvsdpu:593: iti sāhitya-darpaṇe rasādi-nirūpaṇo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visvsdpu:595: kāvyaṃ dhvanir guṇībhūta-vyaṅgaṃ ceti dvidhā matā /
GK16visvsdpu:596: vācyātiśayini vyaṅgyo dhvanis tat kāvyam uttamam // VisSd_4.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:597: bhedau dhvaner api dvāv udīritau lakṣaṇābhidhā-mūlau /
GK16visvsdpu:602: asaṃlakṣya-kramo yatra vyaṅgyo lakṣya-kramas tathā // VisSd_4.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:605: eko 'pi bhedo 'nantatvāt saṅkhyeyas tasya naiva yat // VisSd_4.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:607: dhvanir lakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyas trividhaḥ kathito budhaiḥ // VisSd_4.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:609: vastu vālaṅkṛtir veti dvidhārthaḥ saṃbhavī svataḥ // VisSd_4.7 //
GK16visvsdpu:610: kaveḥ prauḍhokti-sikto vā tan nibaddhasya veti ṣaṭ /
GK16visvsdpu:611: ṣaḍbhis tair vyajyamānas tu vastv alaṅkāra-rūpakaḥ // VisSd_4.8 //
GK16visvsdpu:613: ekaḥ śabdārtha-śakty-utthe tad aṣṭadaśadhā dhvaniḥ // VisSd_4.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:615: prabandhe 'pi mato dhīrair artha-śakty-udbhavo dhvaniḥ // VisSd_4.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:617: tad evam eka-pañcāśad bhedās tasya dhvaner matāḥ // VisSd_4.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:620: aparaṃ tu guṇī-bhūta-vyaṅgyaṃ vācyād anuttame vyaṅgye /
GK16visvsdpu:621: tatra syād itarāṅgaṃ kākvākṣiptaṃ ca vācya-siddha-vyaṅgyam // VisSd_4.13
GK16visvsdpu:623: vyaṅgyam asundaram evaṃ bhedās tasyoditā aṣṭau // VisSd_4.14 //
GK16visvsdpu:626: pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ vṛttīnāṃ viśrānter abhidhātāt paryalakṣaṇākhyānām /
GK16visvsdpu:627: aṅgīkāryā turyā vṛttir bodhe rasādīnām // VisSd_5.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:630: prāg asattvād rasāder no bodhike lakṣaṇābhidhe /
GK16visvsdpu:631: kiṃ ca mukhyārtha-bādhasya virahād api lakṣaṇā // VisSd_5.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:633: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtir na ca rasādi-dhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visvsdpu:634: sā ceyaṃ vyañjanā-nāma vṛttir ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:635: rasa-vyaktau punar vṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:640: dṛśyaṃ tatrābhineyaṃ tad-rūpāropāt tu rūpakam // VisSd_6.1 //
GK16visvsdpu:642: āṅgiko vācikaś caivam āhāryaḥ sāttvikas tathā // VisSd_6.2 //
GK16visvsdpu:644: īhāmṛgāṅka-vīthyaḥ prahasanam iti rūpakāṇi daśa // VisSd_6.3 //
GK16visvsdpu:648: durmallikā prakaraṇī hallīśako bhāṇiketi ca // VisSd_6.5 //
GK16visvsdpu:650: vinā viśeṣaṃ sarveṣāṃ lakṣma nāṭakavan matam // VisSd_6.6 //
GK16visvsdpu:656: divyo 'tha divyādivyo vā guṇavān nāyako mataḥ // VisSd_6.9 //
GK16visvsdpu:657: eka eva bhaved aṅgī śṛṅgāro vīra eva vā /
GK16visvsdpu:658: aṅgam anye rasāḥ sarve kāryo nirvahaṇe 'dbhutaḥ // VisSd_6.10 //
GK16visvsdpu:660: gopucchāgra-samāgraṃ tu bandhanaṃ tasya kīrtitam // VisSd_6.11 //
GK16visvsdpu:664: yukto na bahubhiḥ kāryair bīja-saṃhṛtimān na ca // VisSd_6.13 //
GK16visvsdpu:668: āsanna-nāyakaḥ pātrair yuktas tri-caturais tathā // VisSd_6.15 //
GK16visvsdpu:670: vivāho bhojanaṃ śāpotsargau mṛtyū rataṃ tathā // VisSd_6.16 //
GK16visvsdpu:671: danta-cchedyaṃ nakha-cchedyam anyad vrīḍākaraṃ ca yat /
GK16visvsdpu:678: aṅko 'paraḥ sa garbhāṅkaḥ sa-bījaḥ phalavān api // VisSd_6.20 //
GK16visvsdpu:679: tatra pūrvaṃ pūrva-raṅgaḥ sabhā-pūjā tataḥ param /
GK16visvsdpu:682: kuśīlavāḥ prakurvanti pūrva-raṅgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_6.22 //
GK16visvsdpu:684: tathāpy avaśyaṃ kartavyā nāndī vighnopaśāntaye // VisSd_6.23 //
GK16visvsdpu:688: padair yuktā dvādaśabhir aṣṭābhir vā padair uta // VisSd_6.25 //
GK16visvsdpu:690: praviśya sthāpakas tadvat kāvyam āsthāpayet tataḥ // VisSd_6.26 //
GK16visvsdpu:691: divya-martye sa tad-rūpo miśram anyataras tayoḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:692: sūcayed vastu bījaṃ vā mukhaṃ pātram athāpi vā // VisSd_6.27 //
GK16visvsdpu:694: rūpakasya kaver ākhyāṃ gotrādyāpi sa kīrtayet // VisSd_6.28 //
GK16visvsdpu:695: ṛtuṃ ca kañcit prāyeṇa bhāratīṃ vṛttim āśritaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:699: naṭī vidūṣāko vāpi pāripārśvika eva vā /
GK16visvsdpu:700: sūtradhāreṇa sahitāḥ saṃlāpaṃ yatra kurvate // VisSd_6.31 //
GK16visvsdpu:702: āmukhaṃ tat tu vijñeyaṃ nāmnā prastāvanāpi sā // VisSd_6.32 //
GK16visvsdpu:706: yojayanti padair anyaiḥ sa uddhātyaka ucyate // VisSd_6.34 //
GK16visvsdpu:707: sūtradhārasya vākyaṃ vā samādāyārtham asya vā /
GK16visvsdpu:708: bhavet pātra-praveśaś cet kathodghātaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_6.35 //
GK16visvsdpu:710: tena pātra-praveśaś cet prayogātiśayas tadā // VisSd_6.36 //
GK16visvsdpu:711: kālaṃ pravṛttam āśritya sūtra-dhṛg yatra varṇayet /
GK16visvsdpu:712: tad-āśrayaś ca pātrasya praveśas tat-pravartakam // VisSd_6.37 //
GK16visvsdpu:714: prayoge khalu taj jñeyaṃ nāmnāvalagitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_6.38 //
GK16visvsdpu:716: nepathoktaṃ śrutaṃ yatra tv ākāśa-vacanaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.39 //
GK16visvsdpu:718: eṣām āmukha-bhedānām ekaṃ kañcit prayojayet // VisSd_6.40 //
GK16visvsdpu:719: tenārtham atha pātraṃ vā samākṣipyaiva sūtra-dhṛk /
GK16visvsdpu:720: prastāvanānte nirgacchet tato vastu prayojayet // VisSd_6.41 //
GK16visvsdpu:721: idaṃ punar vastu budhair dvividhaṃ parikalpyate /
GK16visvsdpu:722: ādhikārikam ekaṃ syāt prāsaṅgikam athāparam // VisSd_6.42 //
GK16visvsdpu:723: adhikāraḥ phale svāmyam adhikārī ca tat-prabhuḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:728: āgantukena bhāvena patākā-sthānakaṃ tu tat // VisSd_6.45 //
GK16visvsdpu:733: arthopakṣepakaṃ yat tu līnaṃ sa-vinayaṃ bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:737: yat syād anucitaṃ vastu nāyakasya rasasya vā /
GK16visvsdpu:738: viruddhaṃ tat parityājyam anyathā vā prakalpayet // VisSd_6.50 //
GK16visvsdpu:739: aṅkeṣv adarśanīyā yā vaktavyaiva ca saṃmatā /
GK16visvsdpu:740: yā ca syād varṣa-paryantaṃ kathā dina-dvayādijā // VisSd_6.51 //
GK16visvsdpu:741: anyā ca vistarā sūcyā sārthopakṣepair budhaiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:742: varṣād ūrdhvaṃ tu yad vastu tat syād varṣād adhobhavam // VisSd_6.52 //
GK16visvsdpu:744: arthopakṣepakair vācyam aṅka-cchedaṃ vidhāya tat // VisSd_6.53 //
GK16visvsdpu:746: cūlikāṅkāvatāro 'tha syād aṅka-mukham ity api // VisSd_6.54 //
GK16visvsdpu:748: saṅkṣiptārthas tu viṣkambha ādāv aṅkasya darśitaḥ // VisSd_6.55 //
GK16visvsdpu:750: śuddhaḥ syāt sa tu saṅkīrṇo nīca-madhyama-kalpitaḥ // VisSd_6.56 //
GK16visvsdpu:752: aṅka-dvayāntar vijñeyaḥ śeṣaṃ viṣkambhake yathā // VisSd_6.57 //
GK16visvsdpu:756: yatra syād aṅka ekasminn aṅkānāṃ sūcanākhilā // VisSd_6.59 //
GK16visvsdpu:757: tad-aṅka-mukham ity āhur bījārtha-khyāpakaṃ ca tat /
GK16visvsdpu:760: yadā sandarśayec cheṣam āmukhānantaraṃ tadā // VisSd_6.61 //
GK16visvsdpu:762: yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlād eva pravartate // VisSd_6.62 //
GK16visvsdpu:764: viṣkambhakādyair api no vadho vācyo 'dhikāriṇaḥ // VisSd_6.63 //
GK16visvsdpu:766: bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryam eva ca // VisSd_6.64 //
GK16visvsdpu:768: alpa-mātraṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ bahudhā yad visarpati // VisSd_6.65 //
GK16visvsdpu:769: phalasya prathamo hetur bījaṃ tad abhidhīyate /
GK16visvsdpu:772: patākā-nāyakasya syān na svakīyaṃ phalāntaram // VisSd_6.67 //
GK16visvsdpu:773: garbhe sandhau vimarśe vā virvāhas tasya jāyate /
GK16visvsdpu:774: prāsaṅgikaṃ pradeśasthaṃ caritaṃ prakarī matā // VisSd_6.68 //
GK16visvsdpu:775: prakarī nāyakasya syān na svakīyaṃ phalāntaram /
GK16visvsdpu:776: apekṣitaṃ tu yat sādhyam ārambho yan nibandhanaḥ // VisSd_6.69 //
GK16visvsdpu:777: samāpanaṃ tu yat-siddhyai tat kāryam iti saṃmatam /
GK16visvsdpu:778: avasthāḥ pañca kāryasya prārabdhasya phalārthibhiḥ // VisSd_6.70 //
GK16visvsdpu:780: bhaved ārabhya autsukyaṃ yan mukhya-phala-siddhaye // VisSd_6.71 //
GK16visvsdpu:784: sāvasthā phala-yogaḥ syād yaḥ samagra-phalodayaḥ // VisSd_6.73 //
GK16visvsdpu:785: yathā-saṅkhyam avasthābhir ābhir yogāt tu pañcabhiḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:786: pañcadhaivetivṛttasya bhāgāḥ syuḥ pañca sandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.74 //
GK16visvsdpu:788: mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśa upasaṃhṛtiḥ // VisSd_6.75 //
GK16visvsdpu:789: iti pañcāsya bhedāḥ syuḥ kramāl lākṣaṇam ucyate /
GK16visvsdpu:793: lakṣyālakṣya ivodbhedo yatra pratimukhaṃ ca tat /
GK16visvsdpu:797: śāpādyaiḥ sāntarāyaś ca sa vimarśa iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:799: ekārtham upanīyante yatra nirvahaṇaṃ hi tat /
GK16visvsdpu:802: udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda etāny aṅgāni vai mukhe // VisSd_6.82 //
GK16visvsdpu:806: saṃpradhāraṇam arthānāṃ yuktiḥ prāptiḥ sukhāgamaḥ // VisSd_6.84 //
GK16visvsdpu:807: bījasyāgamanaṃ yat tu tat samādhānam ucyate /
GK16visvsdpu:808: sukha-duḥkha-kṛto yo 'rthas tad vidhānam iti smṛtam // VisSd_6.85 //
GK16visvsdpu:810: bījārthasya prarohaḥ syād udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_6.86 //
GK16visvsdpu:812: vilāsaḥ parisarpaś ca vidhutaṃ tāpanaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.87 //
GK16visvsdpu:813: narma narma-dyutiś caiva tathā pragamanaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:814: virodhaś ca pratimukhe tathā syāt paryupāsanam // VisSd_6.88 //
GK16visvsdpu:815: puṣpaṃ vajram upanyāso varṇa-saṃhāra ity api /
GK16visvsdpu:816: samīhā rati-bhogārthā vilāsa iti kathyate // VisSd_6.89 //
GK16visvsdpu:819: upāyādarśanaṃ yat tu tāpanaṃ nāma tad bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:820: parihāsa-vaco narma dhṛtis tu parihāsa-jā // VisSd_6.91 //
GK16visvsdpu:827: saṅgrahaś cānumānaṃ ca prārthanā kṣiptir eva ca /
GK16visvsdpu:828: troṭakādhibalodvegā garbhe syur vidravas tathā // VisSd_6.95 //
GK16visvsdpu:830: tattvārtha-kathanaṃ mārgo rūpaṃ vākyaṃ vitarkavat // VisSd_6.96 //
GK16visvsdpu:832: bhāva-tattvopalabdhis tu kramaḥ syāt saṅgrahaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.97 //
GK16visvsdpu:834: rati-harṣotsavānāṃ tu prārthanaṃ prārthanā bhavet // VisSd_6.98 //
GK16visvsdpu:835: rahasyārthasya tad-bhedaḥ kṣiptiḥ syāt toṭakaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:840: śaktiḥ prasaṅgaḥ khedaś ca pratiṣedho virodhanam // VisSd_6.101 //
GK16visvsdpu:841: prarocanā vimarśe syād ādānaṃ chādanaṃ tathā /
GK16visvsdpu:845: tarjanodvejane proktā dyutih śaktiḥ punar bhavet /
GK16visvsdpu:847: manaś ceṣṭā-samutpannaḥ śramaḥ kheda iti smṛtaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:851: kārya-saṅgraha ādānaṃ tad āhuś chādanaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visvsdpu:852: kāryārtham apamānādeḥ sahanaṃ khalu yad bhavet // VisSd_6.107 //
GK16visvsdpu:854: kṛtiḥ prasāda ānandaḥ samayo 'py upagūhanam // VisSd_6.108 //
GK16visvsdpu:855: bhāṣaṇaṃ pūrva-vākyaṃ ca kāvya-saṃhāra eva ca /
GK16visvsdpu:856: praśastir iti saṃhāre jñeyāny aṅgāni nāmataḥ // VisSd_6.109 //
GK16visvsdpu:858: upanāyasas tu kāryāṇāṃ grathanaṃ nirṇayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.110 //
GK16visvsdpu:862: samayo duḥkha-niryāṇaṃ tad bhaved upagūhanam // VisSd_6.112 //
GK16visvsdpu:867: catuḥ-ṣaṣṭi-vidhaṃ hy etad aṅgaṃ proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ /
